## Brand Color Integration

Test that brand colors from `_brand.yml` appear in autocomplete:

### Color autocomplete
Type `rn-color=` and select a brand color - it inserts the hex value:

[Brand primary]{.rn-fragment rn-type=highlight rn-color=}
[Brand accent]{.rn-fragment rn-type=underline rn-color=#EE6331}

### Color picker
Click the color square to open the picker and verify brand colors appear:

[Highlight with color]{.rn-fragment rn-type=highlight rn-color=#447099}
